title: Hairline serif
content:
Would really appreciate help identifying this one, or similar kinds, please.

Cheers

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090350im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thickthinserif_4945.png)
author: lil

comments.content: That's (Linotype?) Didot. We have a whole list of similar faces [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20120418090350/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/subclasses/serif_didone/).

Ahh Didot - should have realised.

Thanks
